There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
Things heat up as the Dark Quickening has consumed Connor MacLeod's very being and the Immortal wages war with his very kin - Duncan MacLeod! Will the one cousins be able to prevent the other from taking his very head! Plus: More "flashbacks" to Connor and Duncan in the Old West!
Also, this month, look for special covers from Michael Avon Oeming, Pat Lee, Dave Dorman and David Michael Beck!
